First-time setup:
1. Tap "Enable Keyboard" and enable LexiSharp Keyboard in system settings
2. Tap "Choose Keyboard" to switch to LexiSharp Keyboard
3. Grant microphone permission, then long‑press the mic button on the keyboard to try

For better background service stability, it's recommended to grant the following permissions in system settings:
• Auto-start in background
• Background running (keep alive)
• Show pop-up windows while running in the background

This is an open-source app that guarantees no privacy data will be uploaded.

How to Use the Linking Feature

This feature enables voice recognition from Fcitx (Little Penguin) input method. Usage:

1. Download the modified Fcitx: https://github.com/BryceWG/fcitx5-android-lexi-keyboard/releases (uninstall the original Fcitx first and backup your data)

2. Open Fcitx Settings - Virtual Keyboard - Long-press Space Bar Behavior - Voice Input (AIDL)

3. Update LexiSharp to 3.6.2 or later, enable Settings - Input Settings - Allow external IME linking (AIDL), no need to enable floating ball or accessibility service

4. In Fcitx keyboard panel, long-press the space bar to activate voice input.
